name: @saeon/anyproxy
description: A wraper for anyproxy, to deploy behind Node.js as a caching server

scripts.start: npm --prefix ../logger run watch & rimraf dist && nodemon --watch ./src --exec 'prettier --write "src/**/*.@(js|json)" && NODE_ENV=development babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir dist && copyfiles .env dist/ && NODE_ENV=development TZ=utc node dist'
scripts.start:prod: rimraf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir dist && copyfiles .env dist/ && NODE_ENV=production TZ=utc node dist

author: zach@saeon.ac.za
